subject: Re: New Flock CSM Contact - OR - Eugene PD
body:
You don't often get email from gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Captain Burke, 

Nice to meet you and I look forward to working with the team. Feel free to give me a call today and I would be happy to help with any questions. I do have back-to-back calls up until 1pm (Pacific Time), so feel free to give me a ring anytime after that.

My direct #: (706) 675-5740

Thank you,
Gaby 

On Thu, May 8, 2025 at 7:55?AM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Gaby, 

	 

	Thanks for reaching out.  If I understand this correctly, you are now our point of contact for this project.  I do have a couple questions after an issue that came up during install when a community business questioned the installers.  I am busy with bargaining this morning and Detective Dewitt is out of town on training this week.  I would like to connect with you when I have time later this afternoon.  Is there a good contact number to reach you?

	 

	Thank you

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 4:29 PM
	To: Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: New Flock CSM Contact - OR - Eugene PD

	 

	You don't often get email from gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hi Team, 

	 

	Nice to meet you and I hope all is well. I'd love to schedule a 30 minute call to introduce myself and learn a little more about the organization. Feel free to use my calendar link https://www.getclockwise.com/c/gaby-mahoney-flocksafety-com/admin-training-copy  to schedule a time that works best for you. 

	 

	Thanky you,

	Gaby 

	 

	On Wed, May 7, 2025 at 4:20?PM Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com > wrote:

		Hello Captain & Detective,

		
		I hope you are doing well! As Flock continues to grow, our primary focus is adapting our approach to maintain an excellent customer experience. We have updated our market assignments internally and with that change, I�d like to introduce you to your newly designated Customer Success Manager, Gaby Mahoney (CC'd), who will be the permanent CSM for all regional customers in Washington, Oregon, and Idaho.
		
		As your new CSM, Gaby will be your primary point of contact at Flock Safety, with a focus on helping you get the most out of your investment in Flock. I have filled Gaby in with your account status but if there is anything additional you would like to request from us, please let us know and we will take care of it. It has been a pleasure working with you and I'll let Gaby take things from here!
		
		Thank you and stay safe,
		Emily 

		 

		-- 

	
Emily Atzen
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/JQNYWPQPLEOb.png> 

	
	

	 

	-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=Success&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/m9AoG419PPOj.png> 



-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 



 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/yt/108062/42/0/background.png> 


 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com
